bibl.title: University of Delaware Fieldwork in the Eastern Desert of Egypt, 1993.
bibl.note: The hydreuma near Bir 'Abu Sha'ar el-Qibli. - Water pipeline at Bir 'Abu Sha'ar el-Qibli. - The Via Hadriana and Bir 'Abu Sha'ar el-Qibli. - The water point ca. 1 km west of the main fort at 'Abu Sha'ar. - The main fort at 'Abu Sha'ar/Deir Umm Deheis. - Eastern Desert survey. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., University of Delaware Fieldwork in the Eastern Desert of Egypt, 1993.

The hydreuma near Bir 'Abu Sha'ar el-Qibli. - Water pipeline at Bir 'Abu Sha'ar el-Qibli. - The Via Hadriana and Bir 'Abu Sha'ar el-Qibli. - The water point ca. 1 km west of the main fort at 'Abu Sha'ar. - The main fort at 'Abu Sha'ar/Deir Umm Deheis. - Eastern Desert survey. - Conclusion.
